metadata.title: Is there a way to efficiently search for materials related to the RZ/G2 and RZ/G3?

sections.content:
Question:
Where can I find materials related to the RZ/G series?
There are so many materials that it is difficult to find them.
Answer:
For RZ/G2 and RZ/G3, we have prepared an Easy Download Guide that provides links to related documents for each product.
You can access the Easy Download Guide from the product top page.
By using this site, customers can efficiently access the materials they need.
Example for RZ/G2L
https://www.renesas.com/us/en/document/gde/rzg2l-rzg2lc-easy-download-guide?r=1467981
Suitable Products
RZ/G2, RZ/G3

Where can I find materials related to the RZ/G series?
